Html:
Hi,

How to get my ball to interact with the marker? when i throw the ball using mouse click, it will stop at a point floating in the air without touching the marker. I couldn't get around this problem few days already. What  do i need to check?

You will need to have a good understanding of how physics and objects in the AR scene work together. You can take look at how to do that kind of interaction in ARDomino which is in projects directory of the distribution package. For some explanations, please search through this discussion forum.

Ohan

ohanoda wrote:

Ohan

thanks....yes I am doing my research now on ARDominos
Is it true? If I put the ballNode under the parent node and not under the marker node this will happen
